title: A high frequency alternating current heater using the advantages of a damped oscillation circuit for low voltage Li-ion batteries
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00303A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Joachim Oehl, Andreas Gleiter, Daniel Manka, Alexander Fill, Kai Peter Birke
A Li-ion battery heater uses the battery's energy for heating, enabling subzero charging by integrating a power electronic system within the battery management system and increasing efficiency through the use of an oscillation circuit.
